name: Snakeplant
description:
Snakeplant is a puzzle game about growing plants by controlling their roots. The current demo has 24 levels.

Gameplay:

You can plant the Snakeplant on the ground surface. The Snakeplant has two heads: a root head and a stem head. You only control the movement of the root head. You direct the growth of the stem by picking up different elements in the soil. Your goal is to make the flower of the Snakeplant blossom at the correct position.

Controls:

Plant Snakeplant: Left Mouse Button

Move Snakeplant root: Left Mouse Button (Drag)

Undo: Z

Redo: X

Restart: R

Editor: E (intended for developer)
